Text: Would you guys \n knock it off?
I'm glad to see Aujean \n and Eugie acting like \n a family again.
Come on, \n I'll bet she was.
He's back on \n the drink...
Right!
*Pant* *Pant* \n Kat...

Hahaha, alright, 
 alright. Let's go home, 
 Eugie. We've got work 
 tomorrow!

Why when I was young, 
 I'd drive the women 
 crazy with my runnin' 
 skills.
That's the first time \n I've seen him sober \n in ages!
I've gotta hand it to \n Pops for tryin' so hard.
Thanks Kat.
*Pant* *Pant* \n And the drink?
Glad things turned out, \n Eugie.
Oh... I guess some \n people never change.
Aww, don't go \n embarrassing me in \n front of the boy.
Aw, I don't need one. \n I'm feelin' better than \n I ever have.
Was one of those women \n Eugie's mum?
*Pant* *Pant* \n What?
Thanks to *pant* \n all this exercise *pant* \n I'm feelin' better.
Yeah, I never imagined \n you to be much of a \n runner.
Hey, Eugie! \n Where's your dad?
Meow!
Aujean: \n I need something to chase down that last drink...
What are you lookin' at?
Geez, you're in a \n sour mood. \n Where's your dad?
My stupid pops is \n probably in some bar \n workin' up a tab.
He abandoned \n Mum's store!
Aww, heck. At this \n rate I'm just gonna \n end up like Pops...
Another Aujean!? \n I can't let that \n happen...
I need to figure out a \n way to help Eugie.
Leave this to me, okay?
I'll put a stop to \n his drinking!
You don't stand a \n chance! He's got \n drink on the brain.
Maybe so, but I've got \n an idea, so just wait \n here.
Barred Entries
Heya stranger, \n drop into my bar \n for a drink.
What do you think? Do I \n sound like I could work \n in Pleajeune?
Uh... \n What was all that?
And what's with \n the get-up?
Cut me some slack, \n Eugie. Just hear me out.
Whenever Aujean tries \n to enter a bar...
I'm going to pretend to \n be on staff and refuse \n him access.

He has to give up 
 drinking if he thinks 
 no one will serve 
 him, right?
Are you serious?

It's the only way. 
 He has to be the one 
 to decide to give up 
 drinking.
And if every bar in town \n refuses him, he's bound \n to give up.

He'll realise he needs 
 to be home with his boy, 
 not drinking his sorrows 
 away!
Home...

Eugie, could you 
 find a good lookout 
 spot and update me 
 on your dad?
I'll help this kid get \n back his dad... \n somehow.
Eugie, go ahead.
I spotted Pops.
Then let's get started.
Don't go shiftin' \n gravity where Pops \n can see you.
He'd see right \n through your \n get-up.
Yeah, of course.
Okay Aujean, \n just try to get \n past me!
Whasa- \n What's goin' on here?
Won't anyone let \n a poor old man \n have a drink!?
Aujean, maybe it's a \n sign you need to stop.
Wait... \n How do you \n know my name?
Kat!? \n Is that you!?
So you were \n behind all this!

Took you long enough 
 to figure out I was 
 helping with your 
 intervention!

Intervention? Why are 
 you tryin' so hard to 
 stop me from havin' a 
 little drink?
To save your family.
Save my family!?
There's someone waiting \n for you to come home...
Someone? \n Who? \n Oh...
Let's get you back.
Kat, don't let your \n guard down!
Huh?
I know my Pops, he's \n actin' funny.
Oh Eugie, hold on boy, \n Pops is comin' home!
Yes... \n Right home...
After a quick drink.
Pops, don't you dare!
He doesn't give up. \n Your dad's persistent, \n I'll give him that!
He's probably havin' \n withdrawals, he'll do \n anything for a drink.
Then we'll have to do \n anything we can to stop \n him!
Aujean: \n Alright, it's time to hit this town!
Eugie: \n What happened to "we did it"?
He's definitely persistent. But I can be too!
Aujean: \n I just want something to drink!
He's back at it even after getting rejected yesterday!?
Eugie: \n I've never seen Pops so determined!
I'll make sure he sobers up!
Aujean, you need to knock all this drinking off.
Aujean: \n Awwwhy? I can't help wanting a sip here and there.
You've had more than a sip!
Aujean: \n Just one more drink, that's all I need.
Think about Eugie!
Aujean: \n I'm sorry boy, but Pops needs a drink!
I'm not letting you have another one!
Aujean: \n I'm not letting you stop me!
You should treat your body like a temple.
Aujean: \n Sounds like I need to make it an alcoholic offering.
Why are... Why are you so obsessed with drinking?
Aujean: \n I don't... I don't need a reason!
If... If only you put this much effort into your business!
Aujean: \n That... That's that, and this is this. I need my relaxin' time.
Don't... Don't you ever give up?
Aujean: \n Don't... Don't you!?
You... You can't go on like this forever.
Aujean: \n Neither can you!
Please... stop...
Aujean: \n N... Never!
Aujean: \n RAAAAAGH!
Aujean: \n No one can stop me!

Drunk Man: \n Heya honey, let's chat.

Drunk Man: \n You're so pretty... pretty... pretty...
Sorry, I'm in a hurry!
Can't talk, I'm in a rush!
Uh, thanks, but I don't have time to talk.
Sorry, we're packed tonight.
Aujean: \n You are? Alright, I'll try somewhere else.
All full tonight.
Aujean: \n Fine, I'll just take my business somewhere else.
We're jam packed tonight.
Aujean: \n Aww, come on, what's going on?
We did it!
Sorry, no room...
Aujean: \n I'll try somewhere else then.
Sorry, we're closed down from a health violation.
Aujean: \n What a way to run a business... Isn't any place open!?
We were booked for a party.
Aujean: \n Fine! I'll just go home then.
Phew, managed to hold him off...
He has to give up now... doesn't he?
I'm sorry, we're full here.
Aujean: \n Come on, can't a man get a drink in this town?
We're not open today, gotta renovate the place.
Aujean: \n There's gotta be someplace open in town!
Sorry, we just got a reservation for a huge group.
Aujean: \n Of all the luck! Goddess of drink, don't abandon me now.
Aujean: \n Kat... What are you doin' here!?
Shoot, Aujean saw through my disguise!
Aujean: \n Alright, it's time for a drink!
Oh no!
I need to make sure he doesn't see my face.
